Posted By: Eternal_Blue (5/29/2010 3:40:46 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
One of my first Magic cards. (Not that anybody would care :P)  
Pretty overcosted. Which is probably why my friend gave me this card in the first place :D  
  
I always found the artwork to be pretty cool though.  
And liked how it's the reason [Kamahl](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=29963) is bald. *(My first Vorthos experience about background lore)*  
Probably that's also why he has just 1 tougness left. His flavor text even supports this thought:  
"*I didn't come to play. I came to win.*"  
He didn't come into play - his pet did. And burned him for 4.  
Then he was like: "Screw taming these curs! When i grow up, i shall become a great fighter like [Balthor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=19553) instead."  
(He would later realize he'd [like to be an animal tamer afterall and become a druid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=40538).)
posts.html:

Pretty overcosted. Which is probably why my friend gave me this card in the first place :D

I always found the artwork to be pretty cool though.
And liked how it's the reason Kamahl is bald. (My first Vorthos experience about background lore)
Probably that's also why he has just 1 tougness left. His flavor text even supports this thought:
"I didn't come to play. I came to win."
He didn't come into play - his pet did. And burned him for 4.
Then he was like: "Screw taming these curs! When i grow up, i shall become a great fighter like Balthor instead."
(He would later realize he'd like to be an animal tamer afterall and become a druid.)
